full_text: In the past year women have been murdered for such offences as wearing make-up and chatting online. Last month a Saudi woman was killed by her brothers for having a Snapchat account https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt

localize.full_text: 在过去的一年里，女性因化妆和在线聊天等罪行被谋杀。上个月，一名沙特妇女因拥有一个Snapchat账户而被其兄弟杀害，https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt。
在過去的一年裏，女性因化妝和在線聊天等罪行被謀殺。上個月，一名沙特婦女因擁有一個Snapchat賬戶而被其兄弟殺害，https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt。
